profile.name: Nick Lockwood
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Charcoal Design
profile.summary: Highly skilled software developer with a diverse background in open-source projects and iOS/macOS applications. Proven expertise in concurrency, caching, and UI development.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of multiple iOS/macOS applications using Swift and Objective-C.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable architecture.
Mentored junior developers on best practices for software development and testing.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple iOS/macOS applications using Swift, Objective-C, and Ruby.
Contributed to open-source projects such as SVGPath, SwiftFormat, and Euclid.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated multiple open-source projects on GitHub.
Collaborated with other maintainers to resolve issues and improve code quality.

experience.title: Software Developer
description: Developed multiple software applications using C, JavaScript, and Ruby.
Worked on various projects with a focus on concurrency and caching.

Concurrency and Caching: Concurrent programming techniques (e.g. async/await, dispatch queues)
Mathematical Expression Evaluation: Expression: A cross-platform Swift library for evaluating mathematical expressions at runtime
Euclid: A Swift library for creating and manipulating 3D geometry
3D Geometry and Rendering: Euclid: A Swift library for creating and manipulating 3D geometry
GZIP: A simple NSData category for gzipping/unzipping data in iOS and Mac OS
